# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-driver-huawei-overlay-1.0.0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1086/org/openo/sdno/driver-huawei-overlay/overlayvpndriver-deployment/1.0.0/overlayvpndriver-deployment-1.0.0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-driver-huawei-overlay-1.0.0.zip && rm -f sdno-driver-huawei-overlay-1.0.0.zip
EXPOSE 8536
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1086 > OPENO_VERSION
